sentences.sContent: Acts for and on behalf of clients in the areas of property transfer, company and business law, trusts, wills, probate and litigation under the general supervision of a Barrister or Solicitor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Acts for and on behalf of clients in the areas of property transfer, company and business law, trusts, wills, probate and litigation under the general supervision of a Barrister or Solicitor.
sentences.sCn: 在律师的监督下，代表客户处理财产转让、公司和商业法律、基金、遗嘱，遗嘱认证和诉讼事务。

sentences.sContent: Ifsome of your funds and/or assets have been acquired by inheritance you willneed to provide appropriate evidence, eg probate or evidence from yoursolicitor, to show that they were acquired lawfully.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ifsome of your funds and/or assets have been acquired by inheritance you willneed to provide appropriate evidence, eg probate or evidence from yoursolicitor, to show that they were acquired lawfully.
sentences.sCn: 如果你的部分资金和/或资产是通过继承所得，你将需要提供适当的证据，例如，你的律师提供的遗嘱或证据表明资产和/或资金是合法获得的。

remMethod.val: 遗嘱中 (probate) 禁止 (prohibit) 你动用财产

words.tran: 试用的；缓刑的；实习中的
证明的；检验的；提供证据的
试用人员；实习生；缓刑犯；试读生

trans.tranOther: the legal process of deciding that someone’s  will  has been properly made
